level.heading: Fees.
level.text: ยง 20-213 Fees. a. The biennial license fee for an amusement operator's license shall be one hundred dollars. b. The biennial license fee for each amusement device shall be one hundred dollars, except that where the amusement device is being operated for less than thirty consecutive days, the license fee shall be fifty dollars. c. The biennial license fee for an amusement arcade or gaming cafe shall be three hundred forty dollars.
